title: SCP-7503
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=
For it is the holy burden of the
Sacrum Humanum Imperium,
to purge Sin wherever it may lay.
Amen.
]]
=====

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]

**Author:** [[*user Kilerpoyo]]
